snippet: Karin Knapp and Camila Giorgi won the opening singles matches to give Italy a 2-0 lead over the United States in their Fed Cup quarterfinal in Cleveland.
abstract: Karin Knapp and Camila Giorgi win the opening singles matches to give Italy a 2-0 lead over the United States in their Fed Cup quarterfinal in Cleveland; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Karin Knapp and Camila Giorgi won the opening singles matches to give Italy a 2-0 lead over the United States in their Fed Cup quarterfinal in Cleveland.

headline.main: U.S. Trails Italy in Fed Cup
